content: प्रमी {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To destroy, annihilate, kill, slay. {@--2@} To diminish. {@--3@} To surmount, get over. {@--4@} To surpass, outstrip. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To transgress, infringe. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To lose or miss (one's way). {@--7@} To perish, die. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To destroy, annihilate &c.
